Text: Wow! your web site begs people for money donations and asks them if they would buy dvd's of movies if you made them. Can you say Hello Jail Time. You're using tpb to advertise your for profit torrent site. How did you get your pink skull?

1st off dickhead i dnt beg for shit people donate if they want to and its strictly their choice only.


Second i askd if, people would like DVDs version of movies because some people like myself actually like having DVDs rather then just files on my HDD.Nobody has to buy them if they don't want to.


Last thing you dumb fuck ALL these torrents are illegal and everyone who downloads them can potentially face jail time.Including you but your to much of a fucking retard to understand that.So before you get facts and know wtf your saying keep your mouth shut bitch.I am trusted uploader FOR A REASON.
